name: Daniil Volkov
about_me: My name is Daniil Volkov (aka Daniil Ubica). I'm currently working as a C++ developer. I also study at the Moscow State Technological University STANKIN, majoring in Computer Science. In my free time, I study new technologies in C++ and learn the Rust language. I am also interested in computer game development and am always open to interesting proposals.
